ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Overthere to Oasis
ygData.msgSnippet: Heh heh, didn t mean to set ya off, wasn t really aimed at you Lyrnia.  It s pretty apparent to anyone who is more than a casual observer that you do roleplay.
ygData.messageBody:
Heh heh, didn't mean to set ya off, wasn't really aimed at you Lyrnia. It's
pretty apparent to anyone who is more than a casual observer that you do
roleplay.

I chose Erollisi as well. Interestingly the Erollisi Mantraps in Swamp of
No Hope are not aggressive. Go figure. I figure the Iksar named them, so
it's not surprising they feel threatened by a deity that portrays emotional
attachment as a 'good' thing.

But if you think that's bad, try going to the Isle of Erollisi without
shedding a tear. I remember the first time I found out where Purity Belts
really came from, oh my was that a painful revelation. I spent the next
couple of hours travelling between W Commons and Freeport proclaiming to all
(/shout) that those who who sold such things were in fact evil slayers of
innocent women. A gm actually came and told me it was against the rules to
walk thru the zones spamming. Apparently there is no freedom of religion in
"the Vision". I nearly quit over that incident, though my friends begged me
to stay and I couldn't say no.

Kitasi Faegehearper de E'ci
Servant of Erollisi

Actually I chose to worship Erollisi Marr. I roleplay very well. I also
think it's disgusting that the Flowers in EJ (Erollisi something or other)

At any rate. I don't mind the idea. I'd just like to see the currenly
broken stuff get fixed before they implement anything else "new". We have
enough problems. The last thing I need is to get killed walking into a bard
guild because they somehow screwed up god factions.

Lyrnia
